text: Papiya Adhikari is a Bengali Indian actress and Jatra (theatre) personality. ==Career== Adhikari was born in Kolkata, in the Indian state of West Bengal. In 1985, she first acted in Sonar Sansar, a movie directed by Ratish De Sarkar. She got the break through after playing the lead role in Soshane Kandche Lakkhi. Adhikari received best actress award from the Government of West Bengal for this performance. She played the role of heroin as well as supporting part in number of Bengali films. Adhikari is also active in small screen and Bengali tele-serials like Gachkouto, Chokher Tara Tui and Gangster Ganga. ==Partial filmography== * Sonar Sansar * Pratigna * Swarnamoir Thikana * Mouna Mukhar * Agaman * Pratik * Pathe Jete Jete * Nishi Badhu * Abhisar * Pratisodh (2004 film) * Pati Param Guru * Rajar Meye Parul * Sampradan * Mayer Adar * Shanka * Hanshi Khushi Club * Rose Crazy Rose * Probahini * Kintu Galpo Noy * Babli * Moner Majhe Tumi * Sotoroi September ==References== Category:Living people Category:Actresses in Bengali cinema Category:Indian film actresses Category:Actresses from Kolkata Category:20th-century Indian actresses Category:21st-century Indian actresses Category:Year of birth missing (living people) ==External links== *
title: Papiya Adhikari
